description:
Lightweight gloves for shoulder-season runs. These weather-resistant running gloves have a hidden covermitt for extra protection if the wind picks up. Touchscreen-compatible thumb and forefingers let you check your texts or skip to the next song without missing a beat.

  • Nylon and spandex throughout with hidden weather-resistant nylon covermitt for when the weather starts to turn
  • Silicone print on palm adds some grip
  • Touchscreen-compatible forefinger and thumb let you cycle songs without removing your glove
  • Reflective logo adds some low-light visibility
name: Auclair Run For Cover Gloves - Women's
